billing.title: Facturation
billing.missingCard: Your credit card information is invalid, expired or missing - please update your credit card and save the changes.
billing.expiredCard: The previous card on file has expired, please add a new card to avoid service interruption!

billingContact.title: Changer carte
billingContact.information: Each account is required to have a valid Billing Contact configured. All fields required.

paymentMethod.title: Payment Method

ach.title: ACH Direct Debit
ach.description: Pay for transactions by debiting directly from a bank account.

card.creditDebitCardDescription: Pay for transactions using a credit/debit card.
card.creditCardDescription: Pay for transactions using a credit card. Debit cards are not allowed.
card.creditDenyDescription: Credit card is not allowed in your state

paymentMethod.billingContactWarning: A valid Billing Contact is required before you can configure a payment method.

expiredCard.title: Expired Card
expiredCard.message: The previous card on file has expired. Please update your payment card to avoid service interruptions.

smallNotices.noCard: *Based on the Billing Address above, the Credit Card payment method is not available.
smallNotices.noAch: *Based on the Billing Address above, the ACH payment method is not available.

bigNotices.noCard: We can no longer accept debit or credit card payments in your state. Please update your payment method to ACH Direct Deposit by July 1, 2024, to avoid service interruption. Note: ACH payment setup may take up to 4 days to process.

achSection.warning: This payment option requires a two-step bank verification process, which provides a way to check the validity of a bank account before attempting to process transactions. This verification process helps protect against fraudulent or erroneous transactions, and typically takes 2-3 business days.
achSection.description: Provide the required bank account information below to begin verification. This will trigger the billing system to send two micro-transaction deposits to the bank account, followed immediately by a single debit to reverse the deposits. You will need to verify the amount of these two micro-transaction deposits in the next step.

part1.line1: By clicking [“Begin verification”], I authorize Braintree, a service of PayPal, on behalf of 2600hz to verify my bank account information using bank information and consumer reports and I authorize 2600hz to initiate an ACH/electronic debit to my checking/savings account, Depository Name:
part1.line4: , that will be stored on file, and debited on or after the due date. I agree the ACH transactions I authorize comply with all applicable laws.

agreement.part2: I understand that this authorization will remain in full force and effect until I notify 2600hz that I wish to revoke this authorization.

achSection.bankNotEnabled: ACH Direct Debit in not enabled in this account, please contact your admin.

achVerification.description: Two micro-transaction deposits have been sent to the bank account provided in the previous step. These deposits should show up as "PAYPAL" on your bank statement. Please verify the amount of these two deposits below to complete the verification process for this bank account.

awaitingSettlement.description: We have confirmed the deposit amounts. Please check again later.

achDirectDebit.addFailure: Unable to store this bank account information
achDirectDebit.removeSuccess: Verified bank account and payment method removed.
achDirectDebit.removeFailure: There was an error deleting this bank account
achDirectDebit.verificationSuccess: ACH verification successfully completed for bank account: ***********{{variable}}

verificationFailure.title: Incorrect Amount(s)
verificationFailure.message: The amounts provided above do NOT match the verification records. Please double check your inputs below and try again. You have up to 4 attempts.

message.gateway_rejected: You have reached the maximum amount of confirmation attempts
message.processor_declined: Verification was declined by the processor

add.agreement: I acknowledge the surcharges associated with using this credit card payment method. By paying with this card, I agree to the PayPal Privacy Statement

creditCard.addSuccess: Credit card ending in {{variable}} added as payment method.
creditCard.addFailure: Failed to add credit card as payment method.
creditCard.removeSuccess: Credit card ending in {{variable}} removed as payment method.
creditCard.removeFailure: Failed to remove credit card ending in {{variable}} as payment method.
creditCard.surchargeNotice: NOTICE: We impose a surcharge of up to 2.6% of the transaction amount on Visa and Mastercard credit card products, which is not greater than our cost of acceptance, in states where such surcharges are permitted.
creditCard.debitCardError: We do not accept debit card payments. Please use ACH, or a Visa/Mastercard credit card.

disclaimer.title: Changes to credit card payments
disclaimer.message: In order to continue using your current credit card as a valid payment method, you must acknowledge and agree to this surcharge. If not, you will need to update to a different payment method.
disclaimer.noCardMessage: We've introduced ACH Direct Deposit as a new payment method. However, we can no longer accept debit or credit card payments in your state. Please update your payment method to ACH Direct Deposit by July 1, 2024, to avoid service interruption.

balance.title: Par Minute
balance.payPerMinute: Le paiement à la minute vous permet de ne payer que ce que vous utilisez. Déposez de l'argent sur votre compte pour commencer et payer en fonction de votre utilisation ensuite.
balance.invalidAmount: Le montant de crédits à rajouter est invalide!
balance.creditsAdded: Vous venez d'ajouter {{amount}} à votre balance!
balance.autoRechargeEnabled: La recharge automatique de vos crédits est désormais activée!
balance.autoRechargeCancelled: Vous avez annulé la recharge automatique de crédits avec succès.
balance.disabledAddCreditTooltip: Braintree est requis pour ajouter du crédit. Pour plus d'informations, veuillez contacter votre administrateur.

transactions.title: Transactions
transactions.noData: Pas de transactions durant cet intervalle !

titles.__comment: UI-815: Improve how the prices and categories are displayed for the Trunks

help.inbound: Ceci contrôle le nombre d'appels entrants simultanés que votre système permet.
help.twoway: Ceci contrôle le nombre d'appels sortants simultanés que votre système permet.
